import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import './AcRegistration.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { setProducts } from "../redux/ItemAction"; import axios from 'axios' function AcRegistration() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); // const products = useSelector((state) => state.product.products); const[credit,setCredit]=useState(30) const[subject,setSubjects]=useState([]) const[counts,setCounts]=useState([]) const[lecturer,setLecturers]=useState('') useEffect(() => { // countDocuments let flag = true axios.get("http://localhost:3001/credit", ) .then((res) => { if (flag) { setSubjects(res.data); } }) return () => flag = false }, [credit]) const itemAdd = async(subjectCredit,subjects,lecturers)=>{ if(credit <= 4){ setCredit(0) } console.log(subjects,lecturers,subjectCredit) setCredit(credit - subjectCredit) // dispatch(setProducts(subject,lecturer)); await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/subject",{ subject:subjects, lecturer:lecturers, subjectCredit,subjectCredit }) } return (

{subject.length}

{subject.map((items)=>{ return

{credit - items.subjectCredit}

})}
